descript.abstract: Source: https://data.calgary.ca/Health-and-Safety/Vaccination-Locations/ynek-qdgh/about_dataCollection Date: 10/16/25CRS: NAD 1983 CSRS UTM Zone 11NProcessing steps: Clipped to study area, buffers created, buffers split by community, population calculations.Attribute Definitions:VS_ID: Lettered ID for vaccination sitesVS_NAME: name of vaccination siteVS_ADDRESS1: vaccination site addressVS_ADDRESS2: secondary vaccination site address if applicablePHONE: phone number of vaccination siteCOVID_19: If Covid-19 vaccinations are offered at vaccination locationANTIVIRAL: if antiviral is offered at vaccination sitePNEUMOCOCCAL: If Pneumococcal vaccinations are offered at vaccination locationRSV: If RSV vaccinations are offered at vaccination locationTDAP: If TDAP vaccinations are offered at vaccination locationBUFFER_DISTANCE: size of buffer around each vaccination siteSUM_POP_CATCHMENT_PIECE: population covered by each bufferSITES_PER_1000: vaccination sites per 1000 individuals
descript.purpose: Intermediate data of catchment and vaccination site information

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
